data.description: The scope of this document is limited to the Enabler Release Definition of OMA Device Management Smart Card 1.0 according to OMA Release process and the Enabler Release specification baseline listed in section 5.  The OMA DM_SC 1.0 enabler is based on technologies such as OMA DM v1.2 and OMA SCWS v1.1 respectively specified in the OMA Device Management v1.2 Enabler Release Definition [ERELDDM] and the OMA Smart Card Web Server v1.1 Enabler Release Definition [ERELDSCWS].

This document defines the requirements for Device Management Smart Card (DM_SC) work stream, enhancing the role of the Smart Card started in the OMA DM v1.2 specifications (as defined in [ERELDDM]: [DMBOOT], [DMDDFDTD], [DMNOTI], [DMPRO], [DMREPU], [DMRD], [DMSEC], [DMSTDOBJ], [DMTND] and [DMTNDS]) and also making use of the functionalities provided by these latter specifications.
